comments.body: Curious whether `build` is app specific? Can we build a plugin project too?
This only works for apps. For plugins, you have to build the example app.

@stuartmorgan I started out actually parsing the Xcode project for the `plugintest` target's build settings but that got pretty confusing.  This count check is a bit of a cheat but it would definitely fail if the behavior was wrong or regressed...
Makes sense; I was thinking it wouldn't be in the project at all, so I didn't realize it would be non-trivial. Agreed that a full parser would be overkill here.
